text: Any reference in any law, rule, regulation, document, or record of the United States or the District of Columbia to the District of Columbia Bail Agency shall be deemed to be a reference to the District of Columbia Pretrial Services Agency.

division.text: Criminal Law and Procedure and Prisoners.

chapter.text: Bail Agency [Pretrial Services Agency] and Pretrial Detention.

subchapter.text: District of Columbia Bail Agency [Pretrial Services Agency]. (Refs & Annos)

heading.catch_text: References to "Bail Agency" deemed to be to "Pretrial Services Agency."
